00031   // struct ImageContainerConcept
00049 template <class TPoint, typename TValue, class TContainer>
00050 struct ImageContainerConcept  : boost::Assignable<TValue>, boost::EqualityComparable<TValue>
00051 {
00052 
00053  public:
00054     typedef typename TContainer::Iterator Iterator;
00055 
00056     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT((boost::BidirectionalIterator<Iterator>));
00057     
00058     BOOST_CONCEPT_USAGE(ImageContainerConcept)
00059     {
00060         TContainer j(a,b);
00061         it=i.begin();  // require postincrement-dereference returning value_type        
00062         same_type(i(it),v);        // require preincrement returning X&
00063         same_type(i(a),v);
00064     }
00065 
00066  private:
00067     TContainer i;
00068     Iterator it;
00069     TValue v;
00070     TPoint a,b;
00071  
00072     // Type deduction will fail unless the arguments have the same type.
00073     template <typename T>
00074     void same_type(T const&, T const&);
00075 };
00076 } // namespace DGtal
